price: Kitabı hak ve ile ve mizanı/adaleti indiren Allah’tır. Ne bilirsin belki de kıyamet çok yakındır.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنزَلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَٱلۡمِيزَانَۗ وَمَا يُدۡرِيكَ لَعَلَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ قَرِيبٞ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu alladhī anzala al-kitāba bil-ḥaqi wal-mīzāna wamā yud'rīka laʿalla al-sāʿata qarībun
